text: To the Shores of Iwo Jima is a documentary about the battles of Iwo Jima during World War II. It is a short color war movie. It was produced by the United States Navy and United States Marine Corps. The movie documents the Battle of Iwo Jima. It was the first time that American audiences saw in color the footage of the famous flag raising on Iwo Jima. ==Other websites== *To the Shores of Iwo Jima: the complete movie on Wikimedia Commons * * Category:Movies set on islands Category:Movies set in Japan
title: To the Shores of Iwo Jima
